      通过value获取key get key by value, match the first entry front to back Attentions: for HashMap, the order of entry not same to put order, so you may need to use TreeMap
      static <K,V> boolean isEmpty(java.util.Map<K,V> sourceMap)
      判断map是否为空 is null or its size is 0 isEmpty(null) = true; isEmpty({}) = true; isEmpty({1, 2}) = false;

      parse key-value pairs to map, ignore empty key, ignore space at the begging or end of key and value
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseKeyAndValueToMap(java.lang.String source, boolean ignoreSpace)
      解析键值对字符串到map,忽略空的key parse key-value pairs to map, ignore empty key
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseKeyAndValueToMap(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String keyAndValueSeparator, java.lang.String keyAndValuePairSeparator, boolean ignoreSpace)
      解析键值对字符串到map parse key-value pairs to map, ignore empty key parseKeyAndValueToMap("","","",true)=null parseKeyAndValueToMap(null,"","",true)=null parseKeyAndValueToMap("a:b,:","","",true)={(a,b)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a:b,:d","","",true)={(a,b)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a:b,c:d","","",true)={(a,b),(c,d)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c = d","=",",",true)={(a,b),(c,d)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c = d","=",",",false)={(a, b),( c , d)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c=d","=", ",", false)={(a,b),( c,d)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b; c=d","=", ";", false)={(a,b),( c,d)} parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c=d", ",", ";", false)={(a=b, c=d)}

        另请参阅:

    • 方法详细资料

      • isEmpty

        public static <K,V> boolean isEmpty(java.util.Map<K,V> sourceMap)
        判断map是否为空 is null or its size is 0 
         isEmpty(null)   =   true;
 isEmpty({})     =   true;
 isEmpty({1, 2})    =   false;
        参数:
        sourceMap -
        返回:
        if map is null or its size is 0, return true, else return false.

      • putMapNotEmptyKey

        public static boolean putMapNotEmptyKey(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map,
                                        java.lang.String key,
                                        java.lang.String value)
        增加key非空的键值对到map中 add key-value pair to map, and key need not null or empty
        参数:
        map -
        key -
        value -
        返回:
        • if map is null, return false
        • if key is null or empty, return false
        • return Map.put(Object, Object)

      • putMapNotEmptyKeyAndValue

        public static boolean putMapNotEmptyKeyAndValue(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map,
                                                java.lang.String key,
                                                java.lang.String value)
        增加key和value均非空的键值对到map中 add key-value pair to map, both key and value need not null or empty
        参数:
        map -
        key -
        value -
        返回:
        • if map is null, return false
        • if key is null or empty, return false
        • if value is null or empty, return false
        • return Map.put(Object, Object)

      • putMapNotEmptyKeyAndValue

        public static boolean putMapNotEmptyKeyAndValue(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map,
                                                java.lang.String key,
                                                java.lang.String value,
                                                java.lang.String defaultValue)
        增加key非空的键值对到map中，value为空时使用默认值 add key-value pair to map, key need not null or empty
        参数:
        map -
        key -
        value -
        defaultValue -
        返回:
        • if map is null, return false
        • if key is null or empty, return false
        • if value is null or empty, put defaultValue, return true
        • if value is neither null nor empty，put value, return true

      • putMapNotNullKey

        public static <K,V> boolean putMapNotNullKey(java.util.Map<K,V> map,
                                             K key,
                                             V value)
        add key-value pair to map, key need not null
        参数:
        map -
        key -
        value -
        返回:
        • if map is null, return false
        • if key is null, return false
        • return Map.put(Object, Object)

      • putMapNotNullKeyAndValue

        public static <K,V> boolean putMapNotNullKeyAndValue(java.util.Map<K,V> map,
                                                     K key,
                                                     V value)
        add key-value pair to map, both key and value need not null
        参数:
        map -
        key -
        value -
        返回:
        • if map is null, return false
        • if key is null, return false
        • if value is null, return false
        • return Map.put(Object, Object)

      • getKeyByValue

        public static <K,V> K getKeyByValue(java.util.Map<K,V> map,
                                    V value)
        通过value获取key get key by value, match the first entry front to back
          Attentions:
        • for HashMap, the order of entry not same to put order, so you may need to use TreeMap
        类型参数:
        V -
        参数:
        map -
        value -
        返回:
        • if map is null, return null
        • if value exist, return key
        • return null

      • parseKeyAndValueToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseKeyAndValueToMap(java.lang.String source,
                                                                                     java.lang.String keyAndValueSeparator,
                                                                                     java.lang.String keyAndValuePairSeparator,
                                                                                     boolean ignoreSpace)
        解析键值对字符串到map parse key-value pairs to map, ignore empty key 
         parseKeyAndValueToMap("","","",true)=null
 parseKeyAndValueToMap(null,"","",true)=null
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a:b,:","","",true)={(a,b)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a:b,:d","","",true)={(a,b)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a:b,c:d","","",true)={(a,b),(c,d)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c = d","=",",",true)={(a,b),(c,d)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c = d","=",",",false)={(a, b),( c , d)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c=d","=", ",", false)={(a,b),( c,d)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b; c=d","=", ";", false)={(a,b),( c,d)}
 parseKeyAndValueToMap("a=b, c=d", ",", ";", false)={(a=b, c=d)}
        参数:
        source - key-value pairs
        keyAndValueSeparator - separator between key and value
        keyAndValuePairSeparator - separator between key-value pairs
        ignoreSpace - whether ignore space at the begining or end of key and value
        返回:

      • parseKeyAndValueToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseKeyAndValueToMap(java.lang.String source,
                                                                                     boolean ignoreSpace)
        解析键值对字符串到map,忽略空的key parse key-value pairs to map, ignore empty key
        参数:
        source - key-value pairs
        ignoreSpace - whether ignore space at the begging or end of key and value
        返回:
        另请参阅:
        MapUtil#parseKeyAndValueToMap(String, String, String, boolean)}, keyAndValueSeparator is {@link #DEFAULT_KEY_AND_VALUE_SEPARATOR}, keyAndValuePairSeparator is {@link #DEFAULT_KEY_AND_VALUE_PAIR_SEPARATOR}

      • parseKeyAndValueToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseKeyAndValueToMap(java.lang.String source)
        parse key-value pairs to map, ignore empty key, ignore space at the begging or end of key and value
        参数:
        source - key-value pairs
        返回:
        另请参阅:
        MapUtil#parseKeyAndValueToMap(String, String, String, boolean)}, keyAndValueSeparator is {@link #DEFAULT_KEY_AND_VALUE_SEPARATOR}, keyAndValuePairSeparator is {@link #DEFAULT_KEY_AND_VALUE_PAIR_SEPARATOR}, ignoreSpace is true

      • toJson

        public static java.lang.String toJson(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
        map转json join map
        参数:
        map -
        返回:
